20101226160617.000|20101226160618.000|CC1|SERVED TWO DEPLOYMENTS TO IRAQ.

20101226160619.000|20101226160621.000|CC1|MONTHS AFTER HER SON WAS BORN.  
20101226160621.000|20101226160622.000|CC1|WHILE IN IRAQ HER HUSBAND FILED 
20101226160622.000|20101226160624.000|CC1|FOR DIVORCE AND WAS GRANTED     
20101226160624.000|20101226160626.000|CC1|CUSTODY OF THEIR TWO KIDS.      
20101226160626.000|20101226160628.000|CC1|>> WHENEVER I THOUGHT ABOUT
